trans-unit.source: Represents a class that is used to help select a replica on which to perform any of the Testability actions.
trans-unit.target: Represents a class that is used to help select a replica on which to perform any of the Testability actions.

trans-unit.source: It can be used to select a specific replica if the replica id is known beforehand.
trans-unit.target: It can be used to select a specific replica if the replica id is known beforehand.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you have the option of selecting a primary replica or a random secondary as well.
trans-unit.target: In addition, you have the option of selecting a primary replica or a random secondary as well.

trans-unit.source: <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.ReplicaSelector</codeEntityReference> derives from <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.PartitionSelector</codeEntityReference>, so you need to select both the replica and the partition on which you wish to perform the Testability operation.
trans-unit.target: <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.ReplicaSelector</codeEntityReference> derives from <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.PartitionSelector</codeEntityReference>, so you need to select both the replica and the partition on which you wish to perform the Testability operation.
